New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored a half-century in the match
Jasprit Bumrah took 3 wickets for 7 runs in 4 overs
Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav starred with a half-century
Rashid Khan and Fazalhaq Farooqi registered three-wicket hauls for Afghanistan
Jasprit Bumrah and Arshdeep Singh registered three-fers
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma won the coin toss and decided to bat first
Kuldeep Yadav comes in, replacing Mohammed Siraj for India
Hazratullah Zazai replaces Karim Janat for Afghanistan
Post-Match Reflections: India defended their total as they bundled out Afghanistan for 134 runs
Miscellaneous Highlights: India posted a competitive 181/8 against Afghanistan
Afghanistan needed 182 runs to win in 120 deliveries
The match was played at the Kensington Oval in Barbados
